Message.Title: New product coming
Message.Msg: KO rolling out Dasani Drops in October. Looks like KO going head to head with Kraft who's had some success to the tune of 100mil on this item. Flavored water doesn't excite me, but, I'm old school, advertising will be towards younger generation.....hope it sales.

Message.Title: Obama attemping to re-colonize America for Britain - old war still being fought
Message.Msg: The very very well covered truth.
